name: If on LinkedIn Login Page
actions: type(by='css selector', selector='input[id="username"][name="session_key"][aria-describedby="error-for-username"][required=""][autocomplete*="username webauthn"][placeholder*=" "][aria-label*="Email or phone"][type="email"]', text='snlclient1@gmail.com', scroll_to=True, fallback_x=488.0, fallback_y=309.984375, fallback_width=304.0, fallback_height=52.0)

type(by='css selector', selector='input[id="password"][aria-describedby="error-for-password"][name="session_password"][required=""][autocomplete="current-password"][aria-label="Password"][type="password"]', text='SNL.12345', scroll_to=True, fallback_x=488.0, fallback_y=385.984375, fallback_width=304.0, fallback_height=52.0)

click(by='css selector', selector='button.btn__primary--large.from__button--floating[aria-label*="Sign in"][type="submit"]', button='left', percentage=0.5, scroll_to=True, fallback_x=488.0, fallback_y=525.984375, fallback_width=304.0, fallback_height=52.0)
